DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate urinary excretion renal metabolism vitamin , particular vitamin B12 folate , relation various renal condition involve loss renal function and/or proteinuria .
DOC.criteria: Admission Department Nephrology , Aalborg Hospital Elevated serum creatinine Proteinuria Informed write consent Control subject : Normal serum creatinine creatinine clearance No proteinuria Vitamin supplementation ( exceed predefined value ) Renal replacement therapy ( dialysis )
